111.content:
Misato pulled up to the cabin and stop the car.

         âSo this is the cabin Ritsuko and Maya found three weeks ago.â Misato wondered as she, Shinji, Asuka, and Rei got out of the car. Three weeks ago; Ritsuko Akagi and Maya Ibuki went out of town to this little country side and came back a little changed in a way. The way they sound as they interact with one another was not of Sensei & subordinate but more of mother & daughter.

         When Misato talked to her old friend, Ritsuko talk about a cabin that she & Maya found their and how much of joy they experience there. She then recommend to Misato take her charges and Rei there and spend a month there. Of course even though it would be a out of school month for the 14 year olds, Misato didnât want to go right away nor wanted to give into peer pressure from her old friend she try to avoid it. She even cited the possibility of an Angel attack as a reason not to go.

         However it seems Ritsuko anticipated this response and had came up with a temporary solution. The Angel Shield as it was called blocks Angels from appearing anywhere on Earth for a month. Of course Commander Ikari was pissed but calmed down when Ritsuko explained that it is a one shot kind of deal. Unfortunately it meant the Misato can no longer use the almighty âAngel Excuseâ to avoid Ritsukoâs pressure. She even remembered what Ritsuko response when she said she will go and take the teens with her.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

         âGreat. Maya and I will join you four in a week.â Ritsuko said happily.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

         As Misato looks at the cabin she noticed there was more than meets the eye with the cabin. It was like the cabin sinked into the ground and they were looking at the top floor.

         âThis place looks stupid.â Asuka said breaking the silence.

         âNow Asuka. Dr. Akagi recommended this place then she must have found exciting here.â Misato said and with that she headed towards the door. Asuka huff and soon followed her along side Rei and Shinji.

         Entering the cabin they were treated to surprisingly spacious and furnitured living room with bookshelfâs with buckets of toys. There were three doorways one on either side. The one on the right look like it leads to a staircase heading down. The one on the left lead to a bathroom complete with a door. The one in the back lead to a surprisingly big kitchen complete with everything.

What happens next?
111.title: Evangelion

1111.content:
âStay out of trouble.â Misato said as she headed towards the kitchen.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

         Entering the kitchen Misato was surprise how spacious it was. A long table with 8 to 9 chairs. A bar connected to the kitchen with 3 stools to sit on. The kitchen was almost a standard kitchen except it had two refrigerators and a big freezer.

         Opening the drawers and cabinets; Misato was satisfied with the amount of silverware, plates, cookware, knifes, and stuff.

         âShinji will be one happy camper in here.â Thought Misato as she close everything. Then she inspected the pantry, freezer, and first refrigerator; and was satisfied how fully stock they were but was shock to find no drinks.

         âMaybe they are in here.â Misato thought to herself as she open the second refrigerator. Sure enough she found milk and all sorts of drinks people can think of but sadly no beer. Even the vintage glass bottles where filled with sodas. Then a blueish and white glows coming from the drawers on the bottom. Pulling open the drawers reveal a lot of bottles with weird glowing liquid.

         The ones in the right drawer contain blueish glowing liquids with the labels spelling Restoro. While the ones on the left were filled with a glowing white liquid with labels spelling Reverto.

         âWhat the heck is this?â Misato said out loud.

         âGive me it weak boy.â Came Asukaâs voice from the living room. This cause Misato to sigh, so she close up the drawers and refrigerator doors and headed back to the living room.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

         âWhatâs going on in here?â Asked Misato as she entered the room but got her answer at what she saw. Currently Shinji and Asuka were in the middle of a tug-o-war for a toy.

         âAsuka, I got it out first.â Shinji said pulling the toy towards him.

         âNo way Third, I want it.â Asuka responded as she pulled the toy back towards her. Then a third set of hand grabbed the toy. Shinji and Asuka stop arguing to look at who these hand belong too. Unsurprisingly they belong to Rei.

         âThat is enough you two. Now give it here.â Rei said as she pulled the toy towards her. This cause Shinji and Asukaâs reactions to go from shock to anger.

         âNo way Rei, I saw it first.â Shinji said as he surprisingly pulled it towards him.

         âYeah no way creepy girl.â Said Asuka pulling the toy towards her and soon it became a three way tug-o-war with the three pilots. This stupefy Misato but then shook it off.

         ââAlright enou......â Misato started to say but was interrupted when the toy started to glow. This glow went unnoticed by the three pilots but soon was engulfed by the glow. Misato was shock as the glowing forms started to shrink. When glow finally receded the pilots have been reduced too............
1111.title: Misato decided to explore the kitchen alone.

11112.content:
Misato was shock to see the three EVA pilots reduced to seven year olds, with clothes to match, fighting over a toy.

         âI saw it first.â Stated Shinji as he pulled the toy towards him.

         âNo itâs mine.â Said Asuka as she pulled the toy towards her.

         âGive it here!â Demanded Rei. Misato had enough and yank the toy out of there grasps.

         âENOUGH!â Shouted Misato causing the three to jump a little. âYou three know better.â The three regressed pilots lower there heads.

         âSorry Ms. Katsuragi.â All three said in unison. This shock Misato especially it was coming from Asuka too.

         âItâs like they are really seven years old.â Misato thought then panic that the toy is now in her hand but of course.

info.brief_description: A mysterious Cabin that plays with the ages of those who enter it.
info.description:
This is based on another no longer available interactive called Playing With Toys. I like that interactive and was sad when it was no longer available. So I decided to create a new one.
Basically same premise with same main trigger but with some extra rules.

Rules:
1. Little swearing (depends on cast)
2. No insulting religion.
3. No drug use or reference
4. No killing characters.
5. No replacing characters
6. While most of the cast you can choose from will be female, male characters from the same show can be added.
7. Crossover casts are allowed (ex. Cast of iCarly and Victorious) after the storyline in question reach 15 chapters but only if it makes sense. If not I will delete it.
9. Unbirth is allow but no unconception.
10. A character has to be remain unaffected by the cabin and the age changing (other changes are okay) and that will be dependent on the cast size. Less then 5 characters = one character unaffected. More than 5 = two characters unaffected.

Here is type of regression to focus on.
Physical
Mental

I don’t own the fictional characters that appears in this interactive. They belong to their respective owners
